H0.text: What was the parliamentary constituency of Tony Blair when he was leader of the Labour Party. Sedgefield

H1.text: What was the parliamentary constituency of Tony Blair when he was leader of the Labour Party. Newcastle upon Tyne Central

H2.text: What was the parliamentary constituency of Tony Blair when he was leader of the Labour Party. Gateshead

H3.text: What was the parliamentary constituency of Tony Blair when he was leader of the Labour Party. Segfield

A4.text: Blair was Member of Parliament (MP) for Sedgefield from 1983 to 2007
